'''''Triode'' 18''' is an issue of the fanzine ''Triode''. It includes extracts  from [[Letter to the editor of Triode|a letter from]] [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to the editor (p. 27).<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 557</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=51450|articlename=Triode. May 1960|dated=|website=TB|accessed=18 March 2014}}</ref>
